Package com.dotmarketing.quartz.job

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinaryCleanupJob
    This job will clean up the binary folder created under the binary directory.
    CalendarReminderThread
    Job implementation to run calendar reminder process
    CascadePermissionsJob  
    CleanBlockCacheScheduledTask
    This job will clean up entries in the block cache that are past their ttl date
    ContentFromEmailJob
    This job will queries a POP account for email and creates content.
    ContentImportThread
    This class implement the import contentlet thread to be use by the quartz job schedule task
    ContentReindexerThread  
    ContentReviewThread  
    CronThread  
    DeleteOldClickstreams  
    DeliverCampaignThread  
    DistReindexJournalCleanupThread  
    DistReindexJournalCleanupThread2  
    DistributionJournalCleanup  
    HostCopyOptions
    Class used to specify the copy options when copying assets from one host to other
    PopBouncedMailThread
    This is a quartz kind of job used to retrieved bounced mails notifications from multiple pop 3 accounts configured through the dotmarketing.config.properties
    PublishExpireJob
    This job seaches all content types for those with fields sysPublishDate and sysExpireDate.
    ResetPermissionsJob  
    ShutdownHookThread  
    TimeMachineJob  
    TrashCleanupJob
    This job will clean up the trash folder created under the dotsecure directory.
    UpdateContentsOnDeleteHost  
    UpdateRatingThread  
    UsersToDeleteThread  
    WebDavCleanupJob
    This job will clean up the webdav folder created under the temp directory.
